quotes: In a demotion following this mixed record, Hawke moved him to the less sensitive portfolio of Resources and Energy after the 1984 election.
As Minister for Resources and Energy from 1984 to 1987
managing the Australian fallout from the crash in world oil prices in 1986
In February 1987, shortly after his appointment as Manager of Government Business in the Senate, Evans caused controversy by making comments comparing a Senate debate to rape
